item.title: New iPhone's typically have been sell-the-news events for Apple. Will it be again?
item.description: The forthcoming event comes as Apple notched its biggest revenue growth in four years last month.

item.title: A bullish options trade on this 'Mag 7' stock if Nvidia earnings lift tech
item.description: Options trader Nishant Pant breaks down a bullish options trade on another megacap tech stock as Nvidia earnings loom.

item.title: Morgan Stanley reiterates overweight rating on Nio after Chinese EV makerâ€™s 90% rally in 60 days
item.description: Shares of Nio rallied after the carmaker unveiled its latest ES8 SUV on Aug. 21, a much more affordable option than its premium SUVs.

item.title: AMD will jump another 30% as its chips gain traction with hyperscalers, Truist says
item.description: The firm upgraded the chipmaker to buy from hold.

item.title: This high-flying cement stock has more room to run, says JPMorgan
item.description: The bank upgraded the Mexican building materials stock to overweight from neutral
